Description: Scholarships in USAUniversity of Hawaii ADB Scholarship 2025 in USA (Fully Funded)ByMuhammad Saim Rasheed-August 20, 2024
Eligibility:
The following programs are eligible for the master’s degree programs that are funded by the ADB-JSP at the University of Hawaii at Manoa and East-West Center:
Business Administration (Global MBA): TOEFL or IELTS (EWC and UHM); GMAT (UHM only)Economics (MA): TOEFL, DUOLINGO, or IELTS (EWC and UHM); GRE (UHM only)Geography (MA): TOEFL, DUOLINGO, or IELTS (EWC and UHM); GRE (UHM only)Natural Resources and Environmental Management (MS): TOEFL,DUOLINGO, or IELTS (EWC and UHM); GRE (UHM only)Ocean and Resources Engineering (MS): TOEFL, DUOLINGO, or IELTS (EWC and UHM); GRE (UHM only)Oceanography (MS): TOEFL, DUOLINGO, or IELTS (EWC and UHM); GRE (UHM only)Pacific Islands Studies (MA): TOEFL, DUOLINGO, or IELTS (EWC and UHM)Public Administration (MPA): TOEFL, DUOLINGO, or IELTS (EWC and UHM)Sociology (MA): TOEFL, DUOLINGO, or IELTS (EWC and UHM); GRE (UHM only)Tropical Plant and Soil Sciences (MS): TOEFL, DUOLINGO, or IELTS (EWC and UHM); GRE (UHM only)Urban and Regional Planning (MURP): TOEFL, DUOLINGO, or IELTS (EWC and UHM)

Title: KFC Scholarship 2024-25 Apply Online, Application Form, Requirements
Description: Scholarships in USAKFC Scholarship 2024-25 Apply Online, Application Form, RequirementsByMuhammad Saim Rasheed-August 16, 2024
Eligibility:
Applicants must be employees of a participating KFC restaurant in the United States. Both part-time and full-time employees are eligible.Employees must have been employed by KFC for a minimum of 90 days at the time of application.The scholarship is available to both high school seniors and current college students who are pursuing a post-secondary education.Employees must work an average of 15 hours per week.Applicants must be enrolled in an accredited two-year or four-year college, university, or vocational/technical school.A minimum GPA of 2.5 on a 4.0 scale is generally required.Applicants must be at least 16 years old.

Title: Yale University Scholarship 2024-25, Application Form, Requirements, Deadline
Description: Scholarships in USAYale University Scholarship 2024-25, Application Form, Requirements, DeadlineByMuhammad Saim Rasheed-August 15, 2024
Eligibility:
Yale seeks students who have demonstrated exceptional academic performance throughout their high school careers. A strong GPA, high standardized test scores (SAT/ACT), and rigorous coursework are essential.Yale is committed to need-based financial aid, meaning scholarships are awarded based on the financial need of the student.Beyond academics, Yale values leadership qualities and active participation in extracurricular activities.Scholarships are open to U.S. citizens, permanent residents, and international students alike. There is no distinction in the financial aid process based on citizenship.Best online courses

Title: The Amazon Future Engineer Scholarship 2024-25 Requirements, Eligibility, Deadline
Description: Scholarships in USAThe Amazon Future Engineer Scholarship 2024-25 Requirements, Eligibility, DeadlineByMuhammad Saim Rasheed-August 9, 2024
Eligibility: Applicants must be high school seniors planning to enroll in a full-time undergraduate program in computer science, software engineering, computer engineering, or other related fields of study.Applicants must plan to attend an accredited four-year college or university in the United States.Demonstration of significant financial need is required. This is typically assessed through the Free Application for Federal Student Aid (FAFSA).A minimum cumulative grade point average (GPA) of 2.3 on a 4.0 scale (or equivalent) is required.Applicants must be U.S. citizens or permanent residents.

Title: Coca-Cola Scholarship 2024-25, Requirements, Deadline, Application
Description: Scholarships in USACoca-Cola Scholarship 2024-25, Requirements, Deadline, ApplicationByMuhammad Saim Rasheed-August 3, 2024
Eligibility:
Applicants must be United States citizens.Applicants must be current high school seniors at the time of application.Applicants must have a minimum cumulative GPA of 3.0 on a 4.0 scale at the end of their junior year of high school.Applicants must be planning to pursue a degree at an accredited U.S. post-secondary institution.Applicants should demonstrate leadership qualities through roles in school or community organizations, clubs, or sports teams.Current employees of Coca-Cola, its subsidiaries, or bottlers, as well as children or grandchildren of current employees, are not eligible to apply.Best online courses

Title: AU Emerging Global Leader Scholarship 2025 in the USA
Description: Scholarships in USAAU Emerging Global Leader Scholarship 2025 in the USAByMuhammad Saim Rasheed-July 26, 2024
Eligibility:
The scholarship is open to all other nationals except US Nationals.Students who are still enrolled in a secondary or high school and they expecting to graduate by June 2025.Open to students from diverse and underrepresented global and socioeconomic backgrounds.A minimum 3.8 GPA equivalent out of 4.0 GPA (or in the top 10% of graduating class) for 9th-12th grades.Students must also haveONEof the following Proof:TOEFL iBT: Overall score of 95 with a minimum of 20 in each section.Paper-based TOEFL: Overall score of 24 or higher (taken after May 31, 2017).IELTS: Overall band score of 7.0 with a minimum of 6.0 in each band.SAT: Minimum score of 33 in the Reading section or a score of 630 or higher in the Evidence-Based Reading and Writing section (digital version, as of March 2023).ACT: Minimum score of 29 in English.PTE: Minimum score of 65.Duolingo English Test: Minimum overall score of 125 with a minimum of 115 in each section.Cambridge Assessment English: Overall score of 185 with a minimum of 169 in each component.IB Diploma:Students must complete the full IB Diploma program, including at least three Higher Level (HL) subjects.British A-Levels:Students must achieve a minimum of three A-level qualifications and have completed thirteen years of formal education by August 2025.Must be able to get an F1 or J1 Study visa.
Also Check:
US J1-VISAUS F1 Study Visa
Degree Offered: Students interested in all majors offered at AU are eligible to apply. Check thelist of degree programs for Bachelors students.

Title: Knight Hennessy Scholarship 2025 in USA (Fully Funded)
Description: Scholarships in USAKnight Hennessy Scholarship 2025 in USA (Fully Funded)ByMuhammad Saim Rasheed-June 1, 2024
Deadline: Two Deadlines:Scholarship Deadline: 9th October 2024Admission Deadline at Stanford University: Varies by program
Eligibility: Anyone from any country can apply for the Knight Hennessy Scholarship.The applicant must be enrolled and accepted in a full-time Stanford graduate degree program. The list of all Stanfordgraduate programs.Meet the graduate program requirements.The applicant must have earned a bachelor’s degree in January 2018 or later.Provide English Language Proof.There is no minimum requirement for your grades or scores.There is no application fee for Knight-Hennessy Scholars, but you must pay any application fees required by yourgraduate programwhen you submit that application.
Degree Offered: JD, MA, MBA, MD, MFA, MS, DMA, and PhD
